title: "Search the database"

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
source("style.R")
```

Here you can subset/search the database and download part of it or even just a few selected sequences.
Without setting any taxon, the whole database will be displayed and can be downloaded.
You can also download the whole database [here](download.html).

**The application below might take a few seconds to load**
